short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all inactive tabs. Provides options for enhanced functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes tabs other than the active one. Gives the option to close pinned tabs, store the closed tabs in a "Closed tabs" folder in the bookmarks bar, and close tabs from the right-click menu.
